headline: Benchmark Announces Appointment of Dr. Michael Slessor to its Board of Directors
summary: TEMPE, Ariz., October 07, 2025--Benchmark Electronics, Inc. (NYSE: BHE), a global provider of engineering, design, and manufacturing services, today announced the appointment of Dr. Michael Slessor to its Board of Directors.

headline: Amkor, Amtech, Micron, Seagate Technology, and KLA Corporation Shares Plummet, What You Need To Know
summary: A number of stocks fell in the afternoon session after reports revealed tech giant Oracle is generating lower-than-expected margins in its cloud business and losing money on Nvidia chip rentals.

headline: AMAT vs. KLAC: Which Stock Has an Edge in Semiconductor Equipment Space?
summary: KLA Corporation's dominance in process control and booming advanced packaging growth give it a clear edge over Applied Materials in the AI-fueled chip equipment race.

headline: A Look Back at Semiconductor Manufacturing Stocks’ Q2 Earnings: KLA Corporation (NASDAQ:KLAC) Vs The Rest Of The Pack
summary: As the Q2 earnings season comes to a close, it’s time to take stock of this quarter’s best and worst performers in the semiconductor manufacturing industry, including KLA Corporation (NASDAQ:KLAC) and its peers.
